name: Fantastic Beats
description:
Welcome to our first Unity Game!

The concept for this game was combining a simple rock paper scissors element with rhythm. 

LEAP Motion Controls have been turned off as they are not compatible with the browser. You can download the Executable and play it on desktop if you would like to try it with LEAP motion. https://itch.io/profile/calfra - Callum Fraser https://salmaae.itch.io/ - Salma Abou Elenin Video Presentation
